title: Educational System Design Project Utilizing UML Stereotypes

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Software Engineering Concepts, UML Diagram Creation Experience, and Secondary-Level Mathematics Education Theory Understanding
context.additional_context: Designing a customized education system to strengthen mathematical problem-solving competencies for prospective professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners can model pedagogical elements of educational systems using UML extension mechanisms.
Learners can design creation, monitoring, and adaptation mechanisms for educational models by applying stereotypes.
Learners can prototype a customized educational system optimized for mathematics education scenarios in a PBL (Project-Based Learning) environment.

resources: Multimedia Content Library for Mathematics Education

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
